Inglés: Two gods fought each other in your sky
Two great and powerful foxes who bit and tore with gnarled maws.
Until one day a fatal blow was struck on death and she curled, defeated.
Now there is but one god.
Our indignant and vicious god who bleeds red between the stars.
With love the victor, and death defeated, spirits are no longer led to their proper rest.
The dead rise and wander under her misshapen body.
Empty vessels remain where souls once were.
Spirits twist and churn into beasts...
Seeking an end to their suffering.
We pray for love, for she is all that stands before annihilation.
Sometimes those that love are stained red.
Kissed by those rabid and endless fangs.
They are changed wondrous by their passion.
These folk are the sirens amongst the twilight sea.
The only hope for a spirit to close its eyes.
What does it feel to wake up surrounded by a sea of corpses?
All reduced to minced flesh, but unable to die...
If for my karma, my destiny is to live in Arbuda...
And I've been searching for you...
What do you know about me?!
Some sort of fate brought me to you.
Let me read you what the future departs...
A rusty old katana, used by you long ago. Have seen better days, but still accomplishes it's purpouse.
An old wooden hammer, perhaps used time ago for making mochi, hard to really know.
Cut through against the front target, dealing 1d6 + %d slashing damage.
Quickly slash against the front, right and left target, dealing 1d6 slashing damage.
Hold a defensive stand, gaining %d as shield.
Hold an evasive stand, gaining %d as shield.
When you lose HP, you can spend 1 more to deal the damage back the front target.
When you lose HP, you can spend 1 more to heal half of that damage to the left and right ally.
Mark a Stress to grant yourself a d10 HP as armor.
Expend a d10 HP to poison anyone you can see. The poison lasts until you regain HP or until you die.
Mark a Stress to expose a weak point of someone, ignoring their armor. Lasts until you get hurt.
Pich with violence against the front target, dealing 1d8 + %d slashing damage.
Pich with violence against the right and left target, dealing 1d6 + %d piercing damage.
In a grotesque ritual, with unsettling movements, lay a Small Egg if enough space is free.
Puke out your old self against the front target, dealing 1d12 + %d acid damage.
Cry to freak out the front target, reducing all their roll bonuses by 1.
Soft pinch against the front target, dealing 1d4 + %d slashing damage.
Break the egg, step into this new world, rise and shine little one! Welcome to hell.
